textBeforeTable: Unit Types Sikka Kimaya Greens Located on the Sahastradhara Road, "IT PARK" Sidcul  this Residential complex is part of the largest privately/ Govt -owned development in the city that promises to offer retail, entertainment, leisure, best-in-class office space "Various MNC BPO" in same compound and high-end residences "The Kimaya Greens". Sikka Kimaya Greens offers stylish, spacious and luxurious homes located at Sahastradhara Road, IT Park Sidcul. Sikka Kimaya Greens Residential complex is part of the largest privately/Govt -owned development in the city that promises to offer retail, entertainment, leisure, best-in-class office space "Various MNC BPO" in same compound and high-end residences Sikka Kimaya Greens. Its proximity to the prime locations of Dehradun makes it a perfect place for those looking for a home that's secluded and yet, has everything within an arm's reach. Working with best-in-class consultants, internationally acclaimed architects, light and design experts, sound and acoustic specialists and experienced facility management teams, Sikka have earned a name for building Super Luxury quality, themed environments and destinations. These aesthetically designed premium apartments are a fine balance of the optimum use of space and architectural flair. Sikka Kimaya Greens land allotted by state infrastructure and industrial development corporation of Uttrakhand Ltd. and Designed by Renowned Archtect form Singapore 'Broadway Malyan'.
